answerText: Georg Simmel[10] The aforementioned book by Simmel is titled for the "Philosophy of" this commodity. Simmel argues that the adoption of this commodity created a revolutionary change in social structure.

subject: Social Science
question: Question: This thinker proposed a theory of social types including "the stranger," "the mediator," and "the poor," and his most famous book links Ferdinand TÃ¶nnies's concept of the transition from Gemeinschaft to Gesellschaft with the end of the barter economy. For 10 points each: [10] Name this early sociologist who analyzed economic exchange as a form of social interaction.
